name: Welcome to Yelapa
description:
A puzzle adventure game where you must reach the lawyer Vernon Geddy in his "bastketball court".  

You can pick up some objects (such as rocks, crabs, and keys) then throw them. Watch out for the angry crabs! They'll jump at you if you get too close.

Controls
  • Move: Arrow Keys / W A S D
  • Pick up: Space
  • Throw: Space

The controls were designed to be as simple as possible, other than moving there is just one button. 

Credits
  • Amy Elliott (Art/Programming)
  • Scott Richards (Programming)
  • Joe Shanahan (Programming/Animation)
  • Oliver Thurston (Art/Puzzles)
